 рдЕрд╡рдзрд┐ ЁЯТм : `%s`
ЁЯОзрдкрд░ рдЦреЗрд▓ рд░рд╣рд╛ рд╣реИ рджреНрд╡рд╛рд░рд╛ рдЕрдиреБрд░реЛрдз рдХрд┐рдпрд╛ рдЧрдпрд╛: %s**
helpText:
ЁЯдЦ **Available Commands:**

тАв <prefix>ping
Usage: `check if alive or not`

тАв <prefix>repo
Usage: `show the bot source code`

тАв <prefix>start | <prefix>help
Usage: `show the help for commands`

тАв <prefix>mode | <prefix>switch
Usage: `switch the stream mode (audio/video)`

тАв <prefix>p | <prefix>play [song name | youtube link]
Usage: `play a song in vc, if already playing add to queue`

тАв <prefix>radio | <prefix>stream [radio url | stream link]
Usage: `play a live stream in vc, if already playing add to queue`

тАв <prefix>pl | <prefix>playlist [youtube playlist link]
Usage: `play the whole youtube playlist at once`

тАв <prefix>skip | <prefix>next
Usage: `skip to the next song`

тАв <prefix>m | <prefix>mute
Usage: `mute the current stream`

тАв <prefix>um | <prefix>unmute
Usage: `unmute the muted stream`

тАв <prefix>ps | <prefix>pause
Usage: `pause the current stream`

тАв <prefix>rs | <prefix>resume
Usage: `resume the paused stream`

тАв <prefix>list | <prefix>queue
Usage: `show the songs in the queue`

тАв <prefix>mix | <prefix>shuffle
Usage: `shuffle the queued playlist`

тАв <prefix>loop | <prefix>repeat
Usage: `enable or disable the loop mode`

тАв <prefix>lang | language [language code]
Usage: `set the bot language in a group`

тАв <prefix>ip | <prefix>import
Usage: `import queue from exported file`

тАв <prefix>ep | <prefix>export
Usage: `export the queue for import in future`

тАв <prefix>stop | <prefix>leave
Usage: `leave from vc and clear the queue`

тАв <prefix>restart | <prefix>update
Usage: `restart and update your music player`

ЁЯФ░DeveloperЁЯФ░тЮб[┬йLEGEND-ANKITтДв](https://github.com/LEGEND-ANKIT)
